Good idea, wrong execution. genuine review i played this game for over 200 hours(as a killer and survivor) and every time im just frustrated after 3 games and have to turn it off. im generally not a ragequiter but this game is just sometimes too much. Developers think "they did a pretty good job so far" but they dont listen to the players really. they focus on new content that brings them more money instead of focusing on core game mechanics. the hitboxes are a joke, Servers are horrible to the point where having higher ping as a killer can be considered a advantage and there are many bugs happening on a regular basis. chackers can easily break your game expierience and not be punished for it because the game support basically does nothing. all of this reflects on the community in this game and thats why its considered very toxic, and in fact it really is sometimes.
overall i would say that if u want to achieve something in this game (reach higher ranks) u have to invest a lot of time and nerves. there is nothing more discouraging than being tunnelled out of a game and only having little measures to counter it. You are going to come across all of them - Facecampers,tunnelers,proxicampers,chackers,sweating players that are going to absolutelly obliterate your ambitions and teammates with the reasoning of a potato. Im not gonna say that its all bad tho, u can have fun in this game if u dont play competetive (which at least for me just doesnt work). and the all-platform crossplay is definetly a good selling point for people that just want to have fun with their friends.

상식적으로 뉴비가 이 게임 처음 시작할때 당연히 살인마 보고 시작하지 개 좆 빻은 생존자 모델링 보면서 나만의 펭민쨩 이 지랄 하겠냐 

그럼 자연스럽게 뉴비는 살인마로 게임을 시작하고 한두판은 잘 되겠지 

근데 그 후로는? 고인물 디코 다인큐한테 조리돌림 존나게 당하면서 입구여포 티배깅 ez러쉬 존나게 받고 접거나 생존자로 넘어가겠지 

내 플타임 90퍼가 살인마인데 즐겜한 기억은 손에 꼽음 

그 정도로 살인마가 굉장히 피곤하고 신경쓸게 존나게 많음

1vs4인데 당연히 신경쓸게 존나게 많지 사람 하나 너무 오래 따라가면 발전기 연속으로 띵띵 소리 들리는데 그렇다고 운영하자니 대가리 존나게 아프고 한판한판 개 피곤함

칼찌 신경써야하지 시계도 신경써야하지 호재도 시발 존나게 거슬림 

뉴비 입장에선 뭐가 뭔지도 존나 모르겠는데 판자로 개 뚜드려맞고 칼찌 처맞고 출구여포 인성질 존나게 당하니 당연히 게임하기가 싫어짐

그렇다고 캠핑해서 1킬이라도 챙기려고하면 좆되는 커버와 칼찌 시계로 1킬도 못하는 게임이 굉장히 자주 보임 

게임에 애정도 없는 병신 매튜년이 제대로된 밸런싱을 할리가 없지

차라리 이 게임이 좆망하거나 이 게임보다 상위호환인 경쟁작이 나오는게 아니면 
매튜 씹병신년은 절대로 일 똑바로 안하겠지

그나마 바이오 하자드 챕터때 사람이 많이 모였는데 병신마냥 밸런싱해서 모은 유저 전부 나가리 ㅋ

이제 이게임을 플레이하는 살인자가 없다는것을 4인큐를하게 되며 알게되었습니다 
그래서 친구 5명을모아 사설을 열어 해보았습니다 근데 확실한것은 재미가있고 무섭기도 하며 소리도 지르게 되는것을 확실합니다 근데 5명 모으면 차라리 롤하자는 생각을 하실수도있습니다 데바데도 나쁘지 않습니다 친구한명이 롤을하며 똥을 싸더라도 욕받게 없지만 이게임에서 똥을 싼놈을 살인자를 시킨후 4명이서 손전등으로 지랄을 할수있습니다 혹시 마음에 안드는 녀석이 있다면 뉴비라면 살인자를 시키고 뉴비가 아니라면 살인자를 하여 공포감만이라도 줘보길 바랍니다 역관광 당하실거 같으면 그냥 게임을 하지말고 넷플릭스를 보시는걸 추천드립니다

Es un juego 4 vs 1 donde se supone el asesino tenga que meterles miedo o muchisima presion al superviviente pero lamentablemente no pasa eso por el total desbalance que hay habiendo solo 3 asesinos que practicamente pueden infundir miedo si  los usas bien pq son dificiles, mapas donde practicamente das un paso y tenes un pale uno tras otro como hawkings o midwitch (dando total facilidad frente al asesino como super y un dolor de cabeza como asesino pq literalmente hacen w+ space y te stunean una tras otra, que si lo podes dejar ir pero te van a hacer lo mismo pq son mapas plagadisimos de pales y a veces es imposible agarrarlos)  y en otros mapas para  el colmo grandes y abiertos a veces aparecen menos de 7 siendo practicamente imposible loopear al asesino (esto dependiendo de cual sea claro pero en general a menos que allá una cabaña no vas a poder loopear y vas al suelo asegurado), perks desbalanceadisimas que basicamente son las que mas se ven (Fajador,Inquebrantable, golpe decisivo, tiempo prestado) en algunos casos no sirven contra cierto asesino pero se ven tanto y digamos estan "rotas" pq no hay limitaciones para usarlas te pueden tocar 4 monos con esas 4 y ya fuiste, sumado a que te saquen objetos con accesorios chetadisimos y gg partida (caja de herramienta espaciosa con recambio nuevo + aumento de velocidad de reparacion considerablemente o botiquin morado con aumentos de velocidad de curacion u otros objetos con accesorios rotisimos) pq te ponen uno de los mencionados sobre todo la caja de herramienta con recambio y te hacen 1 motor en 10 segs solo con los recambios, aunque tmb como super a veces pasa lo ya mencionado que vas caminando no ves un pale en todo el mapa y vas al piso, eso tmb da mucha bronca, pero la mayor parte del desbalance es del super pq tienen 99% probabilidades de escapar y el asesino practicamente 1/10 capaz se hace una partida con 3 o 4 asesinados.
Puntuacion: 5/10 
Pd: tiene potencial pero con tanto desbalance, trolls/ toxicos (no lo mencione pq es un tema aparte que en si no es culpa de los desarrolladores) a veces lo hace injugable.

This is one scenario i was chasing one good player and he was looping me around palet 5 times than droped it on my head i was chasing him to another there can be like 25-30 palets so he escaped so i have chased him another 15 secconds to seccond pallet same scenario again than he got away with only one injury and unhoocked his friend i was casing him 3 minutes finaly i got him down picked him up bam he stabed me with decisive strike so he escaped again so here we go again anther looping around pallets i was finaly able to down him after another 3 minutes i had picked him up no hook close so i was bringing him to closest but what happend he got away how? I was barely able to bring him up to the hook to hook him but there was his buddy blocking hook i hit him but guy on my back escaped because ihe wiggled free so both escaped. So i play as survivor now and bully killers it so much fun if you cant beat them join them.Even Developers sayed playing killer its frustrating but we want it to be frustrating for killers. Survivor: Jogando com 1 ou 2 amigos é legal, com sala fechada de survivor melhor ainda
Agora solo com random é horrivel, rank alto só kita e rank baixo tem medo de salvar ou ficar em chase.

Killer: Pra quem curte jogar solo play... infelizmente tem mto menos killer do q survivor fazendo com q em certos horarios demora mais de 3 a 5 minutos só pra achar uma sala.

Mas tamo ai jogando, é legal pra passar o tempo

Playing killer: Get stomped and teabagged by swf  for 5 matches, have 1 very even match, then followed by 4 matches where survivors feel like bots, repeat

Solo queue survivor: Hell is other people
Survive with friends: "Just one more match" for 3-10 hours

some cons:  
-bugs
-game might be hard to get into without prior knowledge of mechanics, perks/abilites etc.
- is also VERY grindy for new players
